queries.query: insert into user_profile ( fbid, active, email, profile) values (?, 'A', ?, ?)
update user_profile set profile = ? where email = ?
update user_profile set active = 'I' where email = ?
select crmId from user_profile where email = ?
insert into event_log ( fbid, event_type, event_data) values ( ?, ?, ?)
insert into event_errors( fbid, event_type, event_data, reason) values ( ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert into enquiries( fbid, uid, email, contactNumber, fullName, propertyName, requirements) values ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select id, productId, productJson from product
select id, productId, productJson from product where productId = ?
select id, productId, popularity,styleSortSeq, productJson from product where category = ? ORDER BY popularity ASC, styleSortSeq DESC
select id, productId, popularity,styleSortSeq, productJson from product where subcategory = ? ORDER BY popularity ASC, styleSortSeq DESC
select id, productId, productShortJson from product where category = ? and styleId = ? and productId != ?

insert into product(id, productId, name, description, category, subcategory, styleId, productShortJson, productJson, popularity, relevance, styleSortSeq, url ) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

update product set name = ?, description = ?, category = ?, subcategory = ?, styleId = ?, productShortJson = ?, productJson = ?, popularity = ?, relevance = ?, styleSortSeq = ?, url = ? where productId = ?
insert into shortlisted(id, uid, email, productId, product) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from shortlisted where productId = ? and uid = ?
